obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0:
* See you again...
* Or not.
* Ha ha ha ha...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_400_0:
* And this is my little Seap.
* Ha ha ha ha...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_401_0: * Over the years, I've collected odds and ends.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_402_0:
* 'Course, I've no attachment to any of it.
* It's just a hobby of mine.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_403_0:
* Around here, you learn to find ways to pass the time...
* ... or go mad like everyone else.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_411_0: * Long ago, the Darkners lived in harmony with the Lightners.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_412_0:
* They were like Gods to us.
* Our protectors.
* Our creators.
* Those who gave us purpose...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_413_0:
* Then, one day we were all locked away in this prison...
* And the Lightners never returned.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_414_0: * Embittered, the King took up arms, and aims to take revenge upon the Lightners that left us behind.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_415_0: * 'Course, even among his troops, some still distantly hope the Lightners will return...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_421_0: * Historically, this land was ruled by the Four Kings, from \cYCARD CASTLE\cW to the East.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_422_0:
* But, recently, a \cRstrange knight\cW appeared...
* And three of the kings were locked away.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_423_0: * The remaining king put him and his strange son into power.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_424_0: * This land hasn't seen THIS much chaos since...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_425_0:
* Ha ha ha...
* Well, you don't need to know about THAT.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_429_0: * He... was a funny little man. Once, the court jester. I, the court magician.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_430_0: * A friend...? Could I consider him a friend...? Perhaps, perhaps not.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_431_0: * But he was the only one who matched me in the games we used to play.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_432_0: * One day, he met a strange someone... and since then, he began to change.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_433_0: * He started saying bizarre things that didn't completely make sense -
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_434_0: * But didn't completely not make sense, either.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_435_0: * Soon, he began to see the world as a game, and everyone as its participants.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_436_0: * As the court mage, and his only companion, I was forced to lock him away...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_437_0: * Or, rather, lock US all away, in his own words.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_438_0: * Since that time, the strange words he's said have stuck inside my cotton...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_439_0: * And my view of this world has become darker, yet darker.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_440_0: * Reflecting on these old memories, I think, perhaps - I miss playing games with him.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_441_0: * And I wonder, if I hadn't been asked to lock him up...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_442_0: * Would I have found a little more purpose in my life...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_448_0:
* Ha ha ha ...
* So you are the "heroes" who are going to seal our Fountain?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_449_0:
* Ha, good luck.
* It makes no difference to me.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_450_0: * Neither Light nor Dark hold a future for a Darkner in my condition.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_460_0: * Ha ha ha, well, whether you can or not, it doesn't matter to me.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_461_0: * But here's a hint - \cYwalk where the stars don't shine\cW.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_472_0: * Eh...? What are you talking about...? A prisoner with an odd manner...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_473_0: * ... No, you couldn't possibly be talking about HIM...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_474_0:
* ... I see.
* After all the trouble I went through to lock him up, you want to release him?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_476_0: * Hmm, now that you mention it, it could be troublesome if he was left alone...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_477_0: * Yes, perhaps it's better if you Heroes dealt with him now...?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_478_0: * After all, it's not as if whatever happens, will matter in the end.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_479_0: * Perhaps a little chaos might be fun.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_482_0: * (\cYBROKEN KEY A\cW was added to your \cYKEY ITEMS\cW.)
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_483_0: * If you're so driven, find the other \cYtwo\cW pieces, and get someone to \cYfix\cW them.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_484_0: * I'll even give you a hint - \cYWalk where the stars don't shine\cW.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_485_0: * Anyhow, if you succeed, come back here and tell me! Good luck!!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_486_0: * If you can call THIS luck... No, it's more like a curse...!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_494_0: * Ha ha ha... I almost wish I could watch! Tell me what happens!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_495_0: * Ha ha ha... though, I suppose if you don't come back, I'll understand, too!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_500_0: * You defeated him!? You REALLY defeated him!?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_501_0: * I see... perhaps you three may truly be "Heroes" after all...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_502_0: * But JEVIL was just a taste of what you'll face from now on.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_504_0: * You too, will begin to realize the futility of your actions.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_506_0:
* At that time, feel free to come back here.
* I'll make you tea...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_507_0: * And we can toast... to the end of the world!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_654_0: * There are many fresh faces in town, I see.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_655_0: * It warms this old fluff to see such hope.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_656_0: * I was even surprised to see the Queen again.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_657_0: * Same as ever... Well, aren't we all.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_661_0: * Those young men have made an interesting shop.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_662_0: * They're leaving the bagel business, so I have the rest of their remaining stock.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_663_0: * ... By the by, it's growing late, isn't it?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_664_0: * You should hurry home once you finish your business here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_665_0: * You don't want to get caught when the sun goes down...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_674_0_b: * Those three young musical men are thinking about setting up a shop here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_675_0_b: * I'm sure you'd appreciate having an option other than me, ha ha.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_73_0:
* Welcome to my
shop, you
ungrateful worms.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_244_0:
That seems
to be all,
no?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_308_0:
I shall
make use
of this!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_353_0: * See thou in the Dungeon, Worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_354_0: * Come by any time, my good Worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_358_0: * I amst the Duke of Puzzles, Rouxls Kaard.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_359_0: * My hobbies includest calligraphy, lawkeeping, bugkeeping, cages...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_360_0: * ... and long walks in the dungeon.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_361_0: * Artest thou one of my admirers, worm?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_364_0: * By the way, no hard feelingst about earlier, right?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_371_0: * Hahaha!! So I might amasseth funds, Worms! An army of funds...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_372_0: * So that I may crushest thou like Fermented Grapes, into a most delicious and adult beverage -
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_378_0: * Haha, why of course I wouldst sell to my compatriarts, the Heroes Of Legend!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_379_0: * Earlier art but a Test of your Heroick Resolve!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_380_0: * Rouxls is ALWAYS on the winning side!! Thou can bet on that!!!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_386_0: * Our Lorde King art a cruel and terrifying Monarcke!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_387_0: * However, he is also Brilliant, for he decidedesteth to appoinst ME, as Duke of Puzzles,
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_388_0: * After pretty mucheth everyone else was firedst or placed inside a cage.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_392_0: * Yes, the King! A terrible Man! An awful Monarcke!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_394_0: * I just envisionethed, perhaps... If I acceptedst this High Ranking Positione...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0: * I could assist to overthroweth him from the Inside!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_396_0: * ... What!? Cannot thou conceiveth of my plan?!?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_402_0: * His Son, on the other hand, is more troublesome than a fistful of fleas!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_403_0: * He alwayst asks me the Worste Queries,
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_405_0: * Our relation is NONE, you little water-beetle! I placate you for your Father's sake!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_406_0: * I do not Wisheth to hear your MP3's! I would rather listen to the sweet song of Death!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_413_0: * Perhaps my wording art a bit Harshe earlier... The King's offspring is a Darling!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_415_0: * When his Father does not cook, his Son yells like a baby bird, until I feed him worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_416_0: * Is this what it means to be High Ranking!?

  showed up,
\m3  That she started going into
  overdrive.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_573_:
*"Knight" this, "Knight" that,
  "Fountain" that...
\m3  Like, what does that Knight

scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_8_: * "Hot Chocolate" - Topped with home-made marshmallows in the shape of bunnies.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_11:
* "Pencil" - Weapon 1 AT
* Mightier than a sword?
* Maybe equal at best.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_14:
* "Bandage" - Heals 10 HP
* It has cartoon characters on it.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_17: * "Bouquet" - A bouquet of beautiful flowers in many colors.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_18: * Perhaps it could be offered to someone.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_21: * "Ball of Junk" - A small ball of accumulated things in your pocket.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_25: * "Ball of Junk" - A small ball of accumulated things in your pocket.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_26: * It smells like scratch'n'sniff marshmallow stickers.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_30:
* "Halloween Pencil" - Weapon 1 AT

scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_33:
* "Lucky Pencil" - Weapon 1 AT
* Covered in green clovers and rainbows.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_36: * "Egg" - Not too important, not too unimportant.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_39: * "Cards" - The Jack of Spades, and the Rules Card.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_42: * "Box of Heart Candy" - It's not yours. Will that stop you?
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_45: * There is a small shard of something in your pocket.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_49:
* "Eraser" - Weapon 1 AT
* Pink, it bounces when thrown on the ground.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_52:
* "Mechanical Pencil" - 1 AT
* It's tempting to click it repeatedly.
scr_litemdesc_slash_scr_litemdesc_gml_55:
* "Wristwatch" - Armor 1 DF
* Maybe an expensive antique.
* Stuck before half past noon.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_9_:
* You drank the hot chocolate.
* It tasted wonderful.
* Your throat tightened...
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_34:
* You held out the flowers.
* A floral scent fills the air.
* Nothing happened.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_42:
* You looked at the junk ball in admiration.
* Nothing happened.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_69:
* You held the cards.
* They felt flimsy between your fingers.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_10: * what? a heart shaped box of chocolates?
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_11: * you wanna make a return on these, don't you?
* okay, okay, no need to break my heart.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_12: * (You could give Alphys the chocolate if you talk to her.)

* Hello?
* Dreemurr residence...
* Who might this be...?
* Sigh... Do not make me come over there.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_13: * Woah, Kris, where the hell'd you get that?
* HAHAHA!! YEAH RIGHT!!! You stole it, didn't you!?
* Well, c'mon!! Let's eat it and hide the evidence!!
* (You and Susie shared the heart-shaped box of candies.)
* (The phone is ringing, but you can't get it.)
* (Both of you had a feeling in your chest...)
* (You're already on the phone, after all...)
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_14: * (... that you shouldn't have eaten all of it.)
* (You unhesitatingly devoured the box of heart shaped candies.)
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_15: * (You accept this destruction as part of life...)
* What? No, I am not giving you a ride home.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_16: * Our house is not far. It is just at the top of town.
* Try walking. It builds character, honey.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_17: * I can talk to you when you get back, alright?
* You held the crystal up to your eye.
* Our house is only at the top of town, you know.
* For some strange reason, for just a brief moment...
* You thought you saw Undyne frozen in ice.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_27: * Oh, excuse me, I seem to be receiving a phone call.
* ... Could you explain what you mean by that?
* (Kris, d-don't give the phone to me!!!)
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_28: * Oh, you are going to the library later?
* Well, thank you for telling me this time! Have a nice time!
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_29: * Kris, do not worry about the library.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_30: * Ah, Kris! You are going to do your project...?
* Oh, are you calling to ask for my help!?
* I will go find our homemade scented glue-sticks!
* ... Oh? You have a partner this time?
* I hope they like butterscotch-scented gluesticks!
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_31: * Kris, do not worry about going to the library.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_32: * If Berdly harasses you about our debt...
* I will come and throw a smoke bomb so you can escape.
* ... maybe not. Hee hee hee. Try your best, honey.
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_33: * Hi honey! How was your group project?
* I can give you a ride home in a minute, I am just...
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_34: * You are still spending time with a friend...?
* Oh dear! Two days in a row, Kris! Is that a record?
* Have fun, honey! Be back before sunset!
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_35: * Calling me again? What must your friend think?
* Have fun with your friend, honey!
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_36: * What? You would like to talk to "Susie"?
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_37: * KRIS FINISH WASHING YOUR DAMN HANDS!!!
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_38: * Would you mind getting it for me while I...
* Kris? Why are you calling our house?
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_39: * (Everybody seems too busy to pick up the phone...)
scr_parallel_convo_slash_scr_parallel_co: * Anyway, so I've been thinking...
* About some of those movies last night.
* Think YOU could survive BLOOD CRUSHERS 2, Ralsei?
* Haha, umm, I don't know, I've never seen a movie...!
* Heh, really?
* Would you want to?
* H... huh?
* Y'know. Come watch next time. Movies.
* Oh...! That would... be nice, wouldn't it?
* ... and then, like...
* It doesn't have to just be movies, y'know?
* You could even... like, go to school with us.
* Then we could get him to do our homework, right, Kris?
* I'd... love to do your homework, Susie...
* And then, like.
* Best idea for last.
* So there's this... Festival in a few days, right?
* And, heh, maybe it's stupid, but...
* Wouldn't it be kinda... fun? If we all went?
* Um, by all, I mean Ralsei too, obviously?
* Susie, I... Um, I'd...
* I'd like nothing more!
* I'd like nothing more than to go, Susie...
* But you... what?

scr_recruit_info_slash_scr_recruit_info_: Said to be someone's best friend, but maybe not. Shine on, you lazy diamond!
* Hey, boss! I'll have a Dark Candy Starfait!
A heart with a big heart. Always supporting others with her bullets.
* (Hathy is going to order a heart-foam latte.)
A simple organism that takes life one square at a time.
* (Looks like it wants to osmose some flavorful cubes.)
A real dust bunny. Known to play dirty, but loves to play clean.
* (Looks like it wants to be dabbed with rubbing alcohol.)
A shape changing fighter. Ironically, blocking is not its forte.
* Everything tastes better with a normally-shaped body!
It cries tears of joy that you are its boss.
An agent of CHAOS, he became DEVILSKNIFE to the pocket.
Obsessed with ranger shows, it lets everyone know it's better than Rudinn.
* Boss...? You're treating me...? Oh, you shouldn't have! (smile)
Although stronger than Hathy, seems to have fewer friends.
* (Head Hathy drinks an ice tea in silence...)
An aggressive antivirus. It's not down with the sickness.
* Pipooo! Nothing beats a nice shot of espresso... Want me to give you a "shot", too!?
Known to say ASOBOH, which means "Let's Play!" ... does it know that?
It was controlled by Queen. But, it's stronger and cooler now, so?
* (It has some kind of energy drink.)
It dreams of re-enacting scenes from cat and mouse cartoons.
A virus with a slightly criminal streak... and a heart of gold.
* Wanna share my soda? We'll both get sick that way... Hee hee.
Colorful and dandy, you can always count on him to work hard.
* Boss? Shall we sit down and enjoy a nice earl grey?
It absorbed the wire with fighting spirit. Gets flustered easily.
* (... it's crushing its energy drink with its hand...)
Loves to coordinate outfits. Strongly dislikes clowns.
You recruited 3 big mice and you're stuck with it.
* (It's getting electricity from the melted cheese like a water wheel)
Passionate about music, but often taken advantage of by sinister types.
* (Seems to just be enjoying the musical ambience.)
Don't scream...! It's not the real monster, just the Darkner. Ooo la la.
* Shush! Don't do the move... I am photographing the drink!
A bouncer that favors brute force over beauty. Gets lost easily.
* Say da word, boss... I'll give dis drink a sip it won't forget.
A real dust... frog. Known to play dirty, but loves to play... dirty.
* (Looks like it want to be dabbed with rubbing alcohol.)
The chatty office star. Obviously quite a looker despite her prudish wear.

* (Seems like they're drinking water.)
* (... feels questionable.)
A sly customer that takes risk until luck strikes. ... cheating also works.
* This drink's not mine? It's fine. I'm just keeping it warm.
The weather girl who really "makes it rain." Like... with water, though.
* Oh no, where's Lanino? He better not be having a team relationship...
A charming weatherman who can control the weather. Which, seems like cheating.
* Haven't been on a date alone for a while! ... which, isn't a date.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_12_0: * You really didn't want to throw it away.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_19_0:
* You took it from your pocket.
* You have a \cYvery, very, bad feeling\c0 about throwing it away.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_20_0: * Hand shaking, you dropped the ball of junk on the ground.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_34_0: * You felt a feeling of relief.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_39_0:
* Hey, Kris! What's up?
* Didja lose your pencil again?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_40_0: * Here, you want the candy-cane one or the one with lights on it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_41_0:
* Huh?
* You want to be partners?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_42_0:
* Ummm... Sorry...
* Berdly already asked me...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_43_0: * But I could ask Ms. Alphys if we could make a group of 3!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_44_0:
* I'll ask if you're sure!
 
Not yet     Yes. Ask.\C1
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_52_0:
* Miss Alphys!
* Umm, is it OK if we have a group of 3?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_57_0: * Yeah, I'm sure there's someone else you can ask!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_62_0:
* Do you wanna be partners?
Not yet     Yes\C1
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_70_0:
* Miss Alphys!
* Umm, is it OK if we have a group of 3?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_75_0:
* Umm, OK.
* You just keep doing your thing, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_80_0:
* Alright.
* Let's get this over with.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_81_0:
* We'll get more chalk.
* Mosey back to class.
* And then, Kris...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_129_0:
* Welcome.
* I am the \cYPrince\cW of this \cYKingdom\cW...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_131_0:
* Kris, Susie...
* There is a \cYLEGEND\cW in this land.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_132_0: * A LEGEND that one day, two \cYHEROES of LIGHT\cW will arrive,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_133_0: * And fulfill the ancient prophecy, foretold by time and space.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_134_0:
* Please, Heroes...
* Listen to my tale...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_151_0:
* Umm, r-really?
* Are you sure?
* It's fairly important.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_152_0: * And... um, in my opinion, it's a really nice \cYPROPHECY\cW!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_153_0: * I think you'd quite like it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_170_0: * Oh... Perhaps I shouldn't have rehearsed it so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_172_0: * Look, dude, we didn't come here for a bedtime story.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_173_0: * Just tell us how to get home.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_175_0: * Ummm, the easiest way would be to seal the \cYEastern FOUNTAIN\cW.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_178_0: * You mean, uh, like the water bubbler or something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_180_0:
* THE fountain.
* That which gives the \cYDARK WORLD\cW form.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_181_0: * ... umm, are you sure you actually know the legend?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_186_0: * But I think I've got enough info.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_189_0:
* W-wait!
* Let me at least tell you how to...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_200_0: * This is the CASTLE TOWN^2, where my subjects reside...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_201_0: * Err, well, they would if I had any...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_202_0_b: * Oh, don't worry about me, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_203_0: * I'm certain I'll find a subject someday...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_214_0: * Why, Kris, you don't have to do that...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_216_0: * Kris, as your Prince and authority, I order you to...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_217_0: * Please let me know what to do!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_224_0:
* Oh, thank you, Kris^2!
* I will!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_232_0: * Er, Kris, you know you can hold [~1] to run...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_242_0:
* Really?
* And yet you choose not to...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_243_0: * Right, who knows how long these leisurely days will last...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_244_0: * There's nothing wrong with taking your time, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_250_0:
* Right!
* You'll move faster by holding [~1]!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_251_0: * And I'll be right behind you, so don't worry!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_252_0: * ... Unless you want to get away, in which case, sorry.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_265_0: * ... You can skip text by pressing [~1]?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_274_0: * Listening to me talk, because you wanted to?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_275_0: * I'll try to make it worth your while, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_280_0: * Right! In the case you read very quickly.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_281_0: * Or you're tired of what's being said.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_282_0: * ... No need to skip my text, right, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_293_0:
* Oh, Kris!
* It's the training dummy I made!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_294_0: * Now seems like a great chance to prepare for the enemy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_295_0: * Would you like me to teach you how to fight?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_308_0: * Right, you already fought Lancer, didn't you...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_309_0: * I was so excited to teach you, I absolutely blanked!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_310_0:
* ... B-but, um...
* Just in case you forgot anything...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_311_0:
* Here!
* I made a Manual for you and Susie!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_314_0_b: * Press [~1] to open the menu and use it in your ITEMS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_323_0:
* Oh my^2!
* The Great Door is opened?!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_324_0: * No wonder Lancer was able to come through...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_326_0: * Kris, once we pass through this door...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_328_0: * A journey foretold exactly by the prophecy...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_329_0: * But, Kris, I believe YOUR choices are important, too.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_330_0: * This world is full of all kinds of people, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_331_0: * In the end, how we treat them makes all the difference.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_332_0: * So let's try our best to get by without FIGHTing.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_635_0: * Okay, okay, seriously, you wanna chat or something?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_648_0: * I just wish she wasn't so... defenseless.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_649_0: * Scary movies, bugs, Santa Claus... everything scares her.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_674_0: * ... So, why am I in here...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_675_0: * Well, they found some crap, so it's just some tests.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_701_0: * This reviewer had Mew Mew 2 as her first exposure to the series...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_705_0: * Instead of like an animal that will die if it goes ten seconds without seeing a beach ball.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_707_0: * Is more stale than the ramen I eat at home by myself with the lights off.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1278_0: * I could have avoided all those empty calories!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1282_0: * Ralsei loves when you give us MONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1283_0: * He will hug you, and call you HONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1286_0: * You don't need money to get me to do that!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1295_0:

* Unless...
* Unless you wanted not to hurt -

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1337_0: * Will you two pick up the slack?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1357_0: * Will you two pick up the slackts?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1378_0:
* I'm Kris Master.
* Ask me about KRIS's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1386_0: * When HP goes negative, your friends fall down
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1387_0: * But bringing them back, is easy-town
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1388_0: * Plain foods and spells, work like a charm -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1389_0: * And with a MINT, you can cure all HARM.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1391_0: * Even normal items and spells can revive people, huh?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1398_0: * If you only ACT, you might start to think -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1399_0: * What about the guy with the scarf in pink?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1401_0: * If you know ACTing will make the enemy friendly -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1402_0: * Then you can ask me to SPARE on the SAME TURN.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1403_0: * Or, cast PACIFY if you know they'll get TIRED.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1404_0: * If you plan ahead, a lot can happen in ONE TURN!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1406_0: * Hey, who's the MASTER here, me or you!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1410_0: * It's a good idea, to give us BUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1411_0: * It'll make you happy, and fill you with LUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1412_0: * Over there, is our DONATION HOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1413_0: * We had a BOX, but it got STOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1423_0: * (If you like our tutorials, please throw your money into a hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1427_0: * (The hole is filled to the brim with cash.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1442_0: * (You failed to budget enough money to throw into a hole...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1447_0: * (You decided to save the dollar for a different hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1459_0:
* We, uh, got bored.
* So we're having a snack.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1463_0: * C'mon! All I ate for breakfast was chalk!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1467_0: * Sorry. What are you two having, exactly...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1469_0: * Just a daily treasure I hid in this stump's orifice.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1473_0: * Feast for yourself, my main man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1475_0: * Kris, do you want to, um, try it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1493_0:
* It's my secret stash.
* A little snackeroo from me to you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1498_0: * C'mon, you're just pretending to eat it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1500_0: * Haha, yeah! That's what I do, too!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1508_0: * (There was a honeypot of salsa inside the stump.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1522_0: * Look, if no one else will eat it, I'll try it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1523_0:

* In here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1525_0:
* No, no.
* It's merely a pot of free-range salsa.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1527_0: * Thanks, that's actually more gross somehow.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1560_0: * Kris, honey, you have grown up so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1561_0: * Someday soon you will be going off to university as well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1564_0: * You asked when your horns were going to grow in?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1565_0: * So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1566_0: * Oh, you wore it for months! Whatever happened to it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1575_0: * Kris, I need to grade these assignments.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1576_0: * Perhaps you should go to bed...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1577_0: * You do not look very well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1592_0: * D... Did you want to talk about something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1600_0: * O-Oh, these flowers...? They're from your dad...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1601_0: * He... He always asks how you're doing in school...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1602_0: * ... Then gives me a bouquet of them.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1603_0: * ... A-actually, that he always gives me flowers...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1604_0: * ... R-really makes me w-wonder if he... If he l-likes...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1606_0: * ... The awesome comics I lent to him.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1607_0: * Honestly, HE kind of reminds me of a superhero, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1608_0: * (He's huge and could kick my ass.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1613_0: * I-It's for my kitty, MewMew! She's a perfect angel!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1614_0: * ... uh? What does she look like...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1615_0: * W... well, I've never actually s-seen her, b-but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1616_0: * Ever since I started putting out milk, it's been disappearing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1617_0: * S... So I'd like to think that there's a cat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1625_0: * K... Kris, even though you never got the chalk...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1626_0: * You deserve an award for trying so hard to find it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1627_0: * So, in return, I can let you borrow, um...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1628_0: * M... My home-made DVD collection of the Symptons!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1629_0: * Y-you know, the sitcom about the middle-class monster family.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1630_0: * It's got every episode in all 28 seasons!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1631_0: * It's the funniest, most quotable show ever...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1632_0: * But make sure you don't watch past the second season %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1633_0: * Since they just rebooted it as Symptons Turbo %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1634_0: * They all started driving their own motor-vehicles %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1635_0: * And fighting giant giga-demons and stuff %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1636_0: * The main problem about that is that it kind of %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1637_0: * Lost the focus on family that it had earlier %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1638_0: * When their vehicles were shaped like animals %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1639_0: * And they were friends with the animal vehicles too %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1640_0: * And let's not get into Symptons Galaxy Force %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1641_0: * Where the Symptons discover another Earth %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1642_0: * On the other side of the Sun %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1645_0: * ... You don't want to watch it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1651_0: * OK, umm, if you ever need help with homework...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1652_0: * My office hours are in this disgusting alley.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1653_0: * H... Heheheh... Umm, tell your mom I said hi.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2110_0: * B-but one time Undyne made eye contact with me!

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2117_0: * I can't slack off for SECONDS without hearing...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2118_0: * "Be a team player, there's no I in PEZZA!"

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2122_0: * Then I'll get a theater degree, become a famous actor...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2123_0: * And let the fangirls roll in, little buddy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2128_0: * Ah, yes, Little Buddy. Good idea. Meet the Rogue's Gallery.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2129_0: * Blue Ears - Soft serve obsessed, no concept of personal space.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2130_0: * Keeps accidentally pouring slushies on me and giggling.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2132_0: * Constantly terrorizing customers with war chants.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2133_0: * Purple Guy - Man, THAT GUY, you gotta...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2134_0: * ... actually, does that guy even work here?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2135_0: * Ah, my co-workers. Where would I be without them?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2136_0: * A happy place, little buddy. A much happier place.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2141_0: * It's fine, Little Buddy. You don't have to watch me suffer.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2142_0: * Just enjoy your freedom... While it lasts...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2151_0:

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2153_0:

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2163_0: * Or even participated to any extent,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2164_0: * Instead of just trying to drink the Fruit Juice.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2169_0: * Let the Angel's power light your way.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2538_0: * So, Kris, could you tell me about her? If that's ok...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2600_0: * ... but she really IS terrible, isn't she...?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2603_0: * I wonder if Alphys would let us switch partners, I mean?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2605_0: * Gets to be, slammed into lockers, and stuff, anymore.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3955_0: * It's been a few years since my father passed on...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3961_0: * Let us pray that the Angel will smile upon her.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3975_0: * As a means to entertain his children.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3976_0: * That such a story, created for a such a simple purpose,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3977_0: * Could blossom into such a large, wonderful, world-changing thing...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3978_0: * That is the majesty of words, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3980_0: * My father was blessed to have such a talent for writing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3984_0: * Ah, Kris. Your brother. He is a very kind young man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3985_0: * Perhaps even a little... overzealous, in his younger days.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3986_0: * He would visit me often to confess... to various, "sins".
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3987_0: * Despite the absence of sin, or confession, in our religion.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3988_0: * I remember his small face, sobbing, as he admitted he had,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3989_0: * "Dropped the lizard in the pit to jump high."

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7240_0: * Y-yeah, we don't need anything like that.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7256_0: * (... that voice, telling me what to do.)

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7274_0: * K-Kris... how long have you been standing there!?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7278_0: * (After all, a dream is just a dream, right...?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7297_0: * Why are you wearing... my watch?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7511_0: * If you SPARE or PACIFY enough enemies of the same type, they will be RECRUITed.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7512_0: * RECRUITs will appear in your TOWN. Wonder what happens if you get them all...?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7519_0: * You will now have access to a STORAGE menu at SAVE POINTS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7520_0: * When you're out of space, ITEMs you find or BUY will be sent to your STORAGE.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7554_0: * Oh, Kris! It's a free editable CYBERPEDIA! I'll add an entry...!

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7583_0: * LOST enemies cannot become RECRUITs ever again.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7584_0: * But, the bonds you break may make you stronger...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7590_0: * (Who has time to read a book in the Cyber World?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7648_0: * (You reached inside and found something alongside a strange piece of glass...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7674_0: * Kris, want to re-read my editable CYBERPEDIA entry?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7676_0: * (Ralsei wrote an article about LOSING RECRUITS. Read it?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7685_0: * From now on, ralsay drools Susie rules
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7792_0: * Kris, heheh! Just between us... You like gambling?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7801_0: * ... that's not true. You just like cheating.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7807_0: * ... What happened to your GUTS? Come on, have some higher stats!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7825_0: * Oi, Kris, luv! It's me, Ramb! You and your brother took me here from the Library!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7826_0: * How're they all? Queen still bossy? Swatch still got a mohawk? And that salesman...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7827_0: * Right, the store, the store! If you want anything, just use your POINTs!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7830_0: * Kris, luv! If you've got POINTs, we've got ITEMs!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7841_0: * You want to buy something using your POINTs? That's lovely, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7842_0: * Gotta use that vending machine though. Tenna doesn't like us... touching the POINTs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7856_0: * Keep your chin up, Kris! This whole house is your friend!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7869_0: * (Exclusive changing room for S-Rank players only!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7898_0: * (A game system is set up, but strictly, and rules are written down...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7900_0: * Wanna play, Ralsei? It's got racing...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7902_0: * M... me? No, I'd rather just watch you two!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7927_0: * Okay, no one is any fun apparently.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8403_0: * Kris, are we all ready to start Round 2?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8488_0: * (If you go back to sleep, you may miss a lot of important things.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8547_0: * Hey! Hey, you! You wanna be an S rank, don't you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8548_0: * Well, you didn't hear it from me, but I might know a way.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8573_0: * If you don't have enough now, it's too late! Try harder next time!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8580_0: * Well, your loss. ... or, I guess you won. But poorly. Right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8621_0: * (It's a door with a PARENTAL LOCK system to prevent the viewing of R-RATED MOVIES.)

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8653_0: * (It's a parental lock. It seems to be undefined.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8655_0: * Oi, Kris! How were the games, luv?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8671_0: * I see, I see... It's all well and good if you feel that way.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8672_0: * Ol' man Tenna's got to have SOMEONE appreciate him, I suppose...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8687_0: * See, I KNEW you wouldn't like it. Something's missing, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8693_0: * Some action... Some mystery... Maybe some more... freedom?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8694_0: * (Just between you and me, if you can get in the S-Ranker's room...)\S0
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8701_0: * (Good thing we've got the REAL game, eh, luv?)\S0
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8719_0: * Um, shall we go back to the stage now?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8744_0: * Haha! Just kidding! Anyway, are you ready to ROCK!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8793_0: * Now, honesty, that'll take you somewhere.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8825_0: * The entrance...? That can be arranged.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8829_0: * The entrance...? Well, it's blocked by a puzzle. Solve it and head left.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8840_0: * You's was already heading that way, weren't ya, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8854_0: * Da boss is lookin' for cheaters. You's ain't seen any cheaters, have ya?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8867_0: * What the -- say it in da cage!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8890_0: * Kris, what's that TICKET? Nevermind, hurry or Mr. Tenna's gonna get mad.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_8907_0: * Good. I hadn't arranged the way back yet.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9013_0: * Kris! This world doesn't take cash. Instead, you'll earn POINTs!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9014_0: * (So how about one last chance to use your $$$...?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9070_0: * ... actually, you don't have any money.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9071_0: * Gee, ever think of saving some from your other adventures...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9078_0: * ... you already have too much stuff!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9083_0: * ... wait, you don't have any money anyway.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9124_0: * (... and it seems you've already chosen.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9137_0: * The only ranch WE need is "cool," right, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9203_0: * What the hell took you so long?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9254_0: * (The sign says "BALL MACHINE User's Guide. Read it?")
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9264_0: * ("Welcome to BALL MACHINE. Insert points to gain PRIZES.")
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9265_0: * ("The minimum is 100 POINTs. MORE POINTs increase GOLD CHANCE.")
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9266_0: * ("Even if you miss GOLD PRIZE, next time GOLD CHANCE increases faster!")
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9267_0: * ("HIT the GOLD PRIZE, GOLD CHANCE will reset... etc.")
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9268_0: * ("You turned to the camera and thanked Tenna for a great toy! Thanks, Tenna!")
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9269_0: * (... is, all part of what it said on the sign.)

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9287_0: * (It's a poster for the COOKING CHALLENGE!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9300_0: * (Here are some tips for the HIGH SCORES.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9301_0: * (The taller a stack you throw, the more points you get!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9304_0: * (And, catching food while jumping is worth 1 point!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9322_0: * (It's a poster for the ROCK VIDEO!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9336_0: * (Perfect timing means extra points! A GOLD LIGHT means you nailed the note!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9337_0: * (LEFT and RIGHT can be used to play notes as well!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9338_0: * (Make sure to HOLD DOWN THE BUTTON for long notes.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9356_0: * (It's a poster for the MONSTER MOVIE!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9378_0: * (It's a giant monster movie! Bash everything!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9379_0: * (Destroy all houses in one attack for BONUS POINTs!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9380_0: * (Survive at the end for the highest score...!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9381_0: * (There are no rewards for getting a high score though.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9399_0: * (It's the door to the COOKING SHOW! Play it!?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9435_0: * (It's the door to the ROCK VIDEO! Play it!?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9511_0: * Hey, hey! This here's an extra special game... It's LOCKED, you know!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9512_0: * That is... unless you pay 500 POINTs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9530_0: * Seriously? A REAL gamer would pay ANY transaction!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9546_0: * (It's the door to the ~1! Play it!?)

close eyes and
think about

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9800_0: * So what the hell were you two doing?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9845_0: * ... we gotta tell Tenna this is the last game.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9875_0: * ... huh? Kris, you really want to talk to Tenna?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9887_0: * Whatever you wanna do, I guess...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9905_0: * Oh, you three! It's me, Elnina! I've never felt more moisturized!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9906_0: * The single life's never felt this cool and collected! Ask me about anything!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9935_0: * Without him to balance me, my only forecast is rain... running down my face.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9958_0: * Oh, you three! It is I, Lanino. The Green Room was, BUSY, so I'm in here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9959_0: * Need any, ahem, assistance from a brave and independent moon?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9988_0: * Without her moisture, my heart and skin have become so... so, dry.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10011_0: * (I wonder if you should... ask Susie how she's doing...?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10034_0: * (... doesn't mess me up so much.)

It's ok to
take it easy
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10057_0: * I accidentally forgot about everything for a moment.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10080_0: * ... and tell Susie it was from me...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10104_0: * Who... are you intending to go with...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10127_1: * Do you want to CHALLENGE AGAIN!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10219_0: * Don't bother, Kris. Ramb's already turned to stone a bit ago...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10220_0: * He was a plug, but because you played with him like any other toy, it made him feel special.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10221_0: * Might have given him a little bit of an ego, in fact...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10236_0: * Always condescending to any plan, saying "what's best for Kris?"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10237_0: * Couldn't get rid of him, so Tenna made him "work the stand"...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10238_0: * Us from Card Castle fit in fine. Him? He never really belonged.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10239_0: * His first day at this stand, he joked "how about the usual?"... no one laughed!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10240_0: * Mixing drinks alone for himself, he wasn't allowed to handle the points...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10241_0: * No one will shed a tear for him. Inside, he was probably stone already.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10245_0: * Ramb... well, he was like Tenna, I guess.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10246_0: * Two guys trapped in the past... just different ones.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10334_0: * Been a while! I got caught smuggling TV Dinners for DARK DOLLARS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10335_0: * But that hasn't stopped me. Wanna buy a TV Dinner?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10355_0: * You're the jerk wanted for violence, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10356_0: * ... heh, I can't believe I'm dealing with a criminal.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10357_0: * How about it? Want to buy a TV Dinner?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10387_0: * ... you already have too much stuff!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10393_0: * Hey! Looks like you couldn't carry all 3.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10394_0: * That's okay... I'll still keep your money anyway.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10395_0: * ... what? Hey, look who you're doing business with.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10400_0: * ... wait, you don't have any money anyway.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10486_0: * (You tried to use the console, but nothing happened.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10498_0: * Huh? It's a "reminder manual" I was revising...
